name: Spindletop Oil & Gas Co.
short_description: Spindletop Oil & Gas Co., an independent oil and gas company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, development, and production of oil and natural gas in Alabama, Arkansas, Louisiana, Oklahoma, New Mexico, and Texas, the United States.
long_description: Spindletop Oil & Gas Co., an independent oil and gas company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, development, and production of oil and natural gas in Alabama, Arkansas, Louisiana, Oklahoma, New Mexico, and Texas, the United States. The company holds approximately 84,248 gross acres under lease in 14 states. As of December 31, 2019, its net proved crude oil and natural gas reserves were 228,747 barrels of oil and condensate; and 4.520 billion cubic feet of natural gas. The company is also involved in the rental of oilfield equipment. In addition, it owns various miles of pipelines located in Texas and other states, which are used for gathering natural gas, as well as transporting natural gas produced by the company and third parties. Further, the company engages in commercial real estate leasing business. It sells crude oil and natural gas to oil and gas companies, brokers, pipelines, and distributors, as well as oil and natural gas properties. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Dallas, Texas.
